section:
D:/gitworkspace/lua/loadlib.c 文件参考 D:/gitworkspace/lua/loadlib.c #include "lprefix.h" #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <string.h> #include "lua.h" #include "lauxlib.h" #include "lualib.h" loadlib.c 的引用(Include)关系图:

#define loadlib_c
#define LUA_LIB
#define LUA_IGMARK "-"
#define LUA_CSUBSEP LUA_DIRSEP
#define LUA_LSUBSEP LUA_DIRSEP

#define LUA_OFSEP "_"
#define LIB_FAIL "open"

#define LIB_FAIL "absent"

#define ERRFUNC 2
